Comment: So controversial to use a common expletive. /s.  In 1992 Limbaugh called the thirteen-year-old child of someone, doesn’t really matter who, but happened to be the President, “the White House dog.”  Fuck you.  Despite your pretend normalcy you will always be people that thought that was acceptable discourse.  Fuck you.  Fuck you!!!  Yeah, listen to Rush laughing at people dying of aids.  And expect manners of speech from your relatives.  Fuck you!  Fuck you is actually really much more polite than things I could say.  It is a non-specific repudiation.  I don’t want to take the gloves off with my older family members that have listened to hate speech for the last thirty years.  They are in their eighties.  What is the point?  Except a private fuck you!  And it is so much kinder.
